(opening soon)

Our second CTF is brewing, coming to you live from October 9th (00:00:00 GMT+2) until October 10th (23:59:59 GMT+2).

Type: Jeopardy

Domains: Pwn, Cloud, Crypto, OSINT, ...

Price: Free

Team size: Max. 4

Prizes:

  • 1st Place: HackTheBox 1 year VIP & Pentester Lab Pro 3 months voucher
  • 2nd Place: HackTheBox 6 months VIP
  • 3rd Place: HackTheBox 1 month VIP


Infrastructure

The Really Awesome CTF team is providing us with a copy of the Infrastructure used for the Really Awesome CTF. A big heartfelt thank you to them.
